mapper.select:
select
from course where status = 1 and name like concat('%',#{name},'%') or code like concat('%',#{name},'%')

mapper.update: update course set status = 0 , `operator` = #{operator}, operate_time = now() where id =#{id}

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
